description:
Jade suspects that the "man in black" who`s been luring adventurers into danger is someone he knows very well.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Ghost May Show Up During Training, but Nobody Told Me About It
Felbukkan egy szellem a képzés alatt, de senki sem szólt róla, hogy ez lesz
Kenshuu Chuu ni Obake ga Deru no Desu ga, Sonna no Kiitenai Yotte Omoimasu
研修中におばけが出るのですが, そんなの聞いてないよって思います
